Actions.Name: Add Client
Actions.Description: Add a client to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add Custom Feed Event
Actions.Description: Add an event to the users feed. Entry is automatically deleted after 180 days.

Actions.Name: Add Group
Actions.Description: Add a group to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add Project
Actions.Description: Add a project to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add Task
Actions.Description: Add a task to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add Time
Actions.Description: Add a time to a project within a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add Time Tag
Actions.Description: Add a time tag to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Client Trigger
Actions.Description: If a client is created, changed or deleted in timeghost, this trigger runs.

Actions.Name: Create Times Excel Report
Actions.Description: Returns an Excel file containing a report of the specified time.

Actions.Name: Delete Item
Actions.Description: Delete an item from a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Client Projects
Actions.Description: Get all projects of one client in one workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Client Times
Actions.Description: Get all times of one client in one workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Clients
Actions.Description: Get all clients from a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Current User
Actions.Description: Returns the current user object with workspaces

Actions.Name: Get Workspace Groups
Actions.Description: Get all groups from a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Project Tasks
Actions.Description: Get all tasks of one project in one workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Project Times
Actions.Description: Get all times of one project in one workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Projects
Actions.Description: Get all projects from a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Time Tags
Actions.Description: Get all time tags from a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Times
Actions.Description: Get all times from a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get Workspace by ID
Actions.Description: Returns the workspace

Actions.Name: Project Trigger
Actions.Description: If a project is created, changed or deleted in timeghost, this trigger runs.

Actions.Name: Tag Trigger
Actions.Description: If a tag is created, changed or deleted in timeghost, this trigger runs.

Actions.Name: Task Trigger
Actions.Description: If a task is created, changed or deleted in timeghost, this trigger runs.

Actions.Name: Time Trigger
Actions.Description: If a time is created, changed or deleted in timeghost, this trigger runs.

Actions.Name: Update Client
Actions.Description: Update a client in a workspace.

Actions.Name: Update Custom Feed Event
Actions.Description: Update a custom feed entry in a workspace.

Actions.Description: Update a group in a workspace.

Actions.Description: Update a project in a workspace.
